Effect - Class in it.polimi.sw2019.model
 
Effect() - Constructor for class it.polimi.sw2019.model.Effect
Default Constructor
effectAnalyzer() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.controller.Choices
called after the payment session ( if the effect is not free), analyze the effect and see if there is a moveBefore inside it called the first time I select the effect
effectHandler() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.controller.Choices
apply the effect and continue the turn called by moveBeforeShoot after the move, by SingleActionManager, by effectAnalyzer doSomething to the view the possible selections
EffectsKind - Enum in it.polimi.sw2019.model
 
endMatch() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.model.Match
this method basically do the final update of the score that will be showned from the view to the client
endMatch(VirtualView) - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.network.server.Server
removes the player
endShootingAction() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.controller.SingleActionManager
this method see if the player can use another effect, if he can it shows him the options, otherwise continue the turn
endTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.controller.TurnManager
this methodo call the corresponding method in the model and do everything necessary to end a turn and start a new one
endTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.sw2019.model.Match
this method updates board and points at the end of the turn and checks if we entered frenzy mode, if the match is ended, etc.
